dmca.title: [ThePlanetAbuse-C3574353Y] [Fwd: [ADMINS] Copyright Infringement and Fraudulent Activ
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the
Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your
claim.

Please visit our web site at
www.theplanet.com/about_us/legal_docs/ThePlanet%20Copyright%20Infringeme
nt%2001%2015%2007%20FINAL.pdf
 
Legal Response Team
THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.

Subject: [ThePlanetAbuse-C3574353Y] [Fwd: [ADMINS] Copyright
Infringement and Fraudulent Activity From One of Your Clients]

Thanks, 
Chad

==== Original Message ====
From: "Chad Simon" <goat@swankdollars.com> 
To: <admins@theplanet.com> 
Date: Wed, 21 Mar 2007 12:25:27 -0400 

This is a multi-part message in MIME format. 
 
 (multipart/alternative) 
MIME element (text/plain) 
I am writing this e-mail to inform you that one of your clients is using
our 
copyrighted material in a fraudulent manor. I have attached the site and
the 
IP of all of the sites in which our material is being misused. Basically
the 
owner of these sites ripped off our galleries and placed a codecaddon
trojan 
where the surfer would click to view a sample video. This is what he is 
trying to install: http://codecaddon.com/download/codecaddon1164.exe  
 
  
 
We would appreciate immediate action to have this individual remove our 
content from his sites immediately. Copyright infringement is something
that 
we take very seriously and we are prepared to use our full resources to 
protect our content and our name. The actions of this individual also 
jeopardizes the trust the surfer will have in our program and this will
not 
be tolerated.   
 
We know it is impossible for a host to control the actions of its
clients, 
so we are in no way holding you responsible for their actions. However,
your 
assistance in protecting our content will allow us to rectify this
amicably 
and expeditiously. We would appreciate any assistance you could give us.

 
Regards, 
Chad Simon 
 
goat@swankdollars.com
